rooms.description: North-facing entrance with Vastu compliant design emphasizing a welcoming and airy space.
Spacious living room, centrally located to encourage family bonding while observing Vastu principles.
Open dining area adjacent to the living room, designed for social gatherings.
Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances and Vastu orientation ensuring proper air circulation.
Master bedroom with private balcony oriented towards North to maximize positive energy.
Guest bedroom designed for comfort and privacy, adjacent to common living area.
Master bathroom with ample space and Vastu-aligned placement of fixtures.
Guest bathroom positioned conveniently near the guest bedroom.
Private gym area designed with robust equipment and ample space, ensuring a soundproof environment.
Utility space for storage and equipment, ensuring efficient layout.

openings.details: Large glass doors to welcome natural light.

garden.description: Expansive private garden featuring native landscaping, water features, and seating areas.

notes: Total area is allocated as per the 1000 sqft specification with balanced distribution across living, sleeping, and recreational zones.
Design aligns with Vastu principles emphasizing North-facing entrances and proper room orientation for positive energy flow.
Building norms in India have been considered for structural stability and safety.
